name: The Lost And Forgotten: Part 1
description: After a rough relationship you set for a trip to Monument Valley to rediscover the person you once were.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 12 GB available space
